title: מחפשים עבודה בהייטק? הנה 10 משרות פנויות שמחכות לכם
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות בחברות שגדלות ומגייסות עובדים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטיים עבורכם
articleBody:
ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות בחברות שגדלות ומגייסות עובדים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטיים עבורכם
מקור: Pixabay
לעובדים בתעשיית הסטארטאפים וההייטק יש דרישות מיוחדות ממקום העבודה שלהם. מעבר למשכורת מתגמלת, כולנו רוצים גם מקום עבודה שייתן משמעות וערך נוספים, אבל גם יאפשר לאזן בין עבודה לפנאי, ושסביבת העבודה תהיה מפרה ומעוררת השראה ושתעודד צמיחה, למידה ומקצועיות. איך מוצאים מקום כזה? בדיוק בשביל זה אנחנו כאן.
רוצים שגם המשרה או חברה שלכם תופיע כאן? הצטרפו עכשיו לפלטפורמת Geektime Insider. לפרטים נוספים
עובדי Matrix
Responsibilities:
– Collaborate on requirements specifications, field research and the creation of use case stories.
– Deliver detailed design specifications and prototypes.
– Work closely with product & development  before, during, and after implementation to ensure optimal adherence to UI & Visual specifications.
– Quickly create and iterate on various designs using wireframes and comps.
– Maintain consistency in terms of interactions and appearance across all web desktop and mobile products, according to brand specifications.
– Work with the visual designers to deliver high definition mocks and detailed specifications that abide by our visual style guide.
– Plan and Facilitate usability test sessions.
Requirements:
– Academic degree in graphic design, human-computer interaction or related field.
– 3+ years of professional experience as a member of a cross-functional team
– Should have a varied of web, desktop and mobile software design experience.
– Experience with the full software development lifecycle, familiarity with agile processes a plus.
– Strong technical aptitude with key UX tools such as wireframing, prototyping, scripting, and flowcharting products.
– Must have an active and updated portfolio that demonstrates usability, simplicity, clarity and consistency at the root of your designs that we can have access to review.
– Comfort presenting cohesive design approaches to non-design audiences.
– Practical knowledge of the principles and techniques of user-centered design
– Prior experience with usability test planning, moderation and analysis desirable
– Excellent communication skills very good English (verbal and written ability) required
To send a CV for the position of UX designer – Matrix

The Marketing Department is the fastest growing department at Plarium, and its focus is not merely to expose as many people as possible to our games, but rather to bring our games to the gamers who deserve them through leading analytics. Marketing is all about combining deep, insightful performance analysis with amazing, impactful creative ideas. Our goal is to optimize our campaigns with the most effective combination of graphics, text and reach to make sure that our games reach those unique individuals who would enjoy them the most.
The Online Media Manager position will work with the media sales community and clients to develop unique and strategically appropriate media approaches, including the exploration of venues. The successful candidate has a significant track record generating leads and conversions for international online CPM, CPC and CPA media campaigns. The Online Media Manager will manage and optimize all aspects of deals through established new networks, implement initiatives that enhance media productivity, create new growth opportunities and increase ROI. The Online Media Manager needs to create and maintain the constant communications with partners and motivate to provide maximum exposure and revenue.
Requirements:
– Fluent English – written and spoken – a must, Mother tongue – Significant advantage
– Minimum of 1+ years as an Online Media Manager
– Proven knowledge in RMX/Appnexus – an advantage
– Proven knowledge in Double click Ad serving platform – an advantage
– Proven, measurable results in developing and growing an internal affiliate channel/program
– Demonstrated ability to initiate and grow relationships
– Knowledge and understanding of affiliate tracking methods, tagging and sale attribution
– Ability to take on multiple projects at the same time
– Must possess strong knowledge of the affiliate marketing industry
– Strong organizational, analytical, presentation and problem solving skills
– Experience in handling of tracking tools and online technologies
– Profound knowledge of MS-Office Products (Excel in particular)
– Passion for online games
– BA/BS degree – an advantage
To send a CV for the position of Online Media Manager – Plarium

Amdocs is looking for an experienced usability expert + user-centered-design professional with strong passion for designing exceptional user experiences. You will become part of a community of usability experts in Amdocs engaged in projects ranging from prototypes to large scale applications, from standard desktop/web applications to TV & Mobile applications, from internal Amdocs interfaces to external customer web sites. Working for a large international company, you will be become familiar with Amdocs’ business segments and have a chance to impact and create user-centered UI designs for service providers from all over the world.
Requirements:
– 3-5 years of experience designing/consulting user interfaces for various channels (e.g. mobile, web, desktop) covering the entire design life cycle-  user needs analysis,  functional design, and usability validation.
– Academic degree. An advantage – BA/BS in Cognitive Psychology, Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction or related field or equivalent work experience.
– Domain Knowledge obtained through academic background and/or certified usability training and/or equivalent sources
– Fluent in English (reading, writing, speaking) with ability to travel occasionally to customer sites overseas, and interact with teams in multiple international locations.
– Familiarity with prototyping and usability tools (Axure, Visio, Morae) is a plus.
To send a CV for the position of usability expert – Amdocs

The Security Researcher will join the Security Innovation Group in Radware’s CTO Office, which researches new network attacks and technologies. Research is focused on new threat domains, including analysis of attack tools and malware, attacking techniques, development of mitigation techniques, and understanding and penetrating into cyber operations. The position requires an all-around player with the inclination and capabilities for research skills, rapid code development, initiative, and ownership.
Requirements:
– Over 8 years of work experience, and at least 3 years in a security position
– An all-around player capable of research, coding, and out-of-the-box thinking
– Proven experience in security research and malware analysis
– Excellent understanding of networking design principles and protocols (such as TCP/IP and IPv4)
– English written and verbal communication skills, ability to write articles
To send a CV for the position of Researcher – radware
